{"id":565610623,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1633350984,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/565610623/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Sudoku","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isValidSudoku(vector<vector<char>>& board) {\n        vector<set<int>> rows(9),cols(9),blocks(9); \n        \n        for(int i=0;i<9;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<9;j++){\n                if(board[i][j] == '.'){\n                    continue;\n                }\n                \n                int curr = board[i][j];\n                if(rows[i].count(curr) || cols[j].count(curr) ||\n                  blocks[(i/3)*3 + j/3].count(curr)){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                rows[i].insert(curr);\n                cols[j].insert(curr);\n                blocks[(i/3*3) + j/3].insert(curr);\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-sudoku"}
